subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to set a global counter for several test cases
msgSnippet: Yang, Sorry for the late response. I regularly run all my tests in the same JVM.  Depending on your use case, it might be a fine trade-off.  It should be easy
messageBody:
Yang,

Sorry for the late response.

I regularly run all my tests in the same JVM. Depending on your use case,
it might be a fine trade-off. It should be easy enough to give it a try
and see if it seems to cause any problems.

David Saff
